rows.label: qst201504_msg0001
rows.name:
Now then... are you going
to tell me why you were
gathering herbs here?

rows.label: qst201504_msg0003
rows.name:
Oh, giving me the silent
treatment? Do you like pain?

rows.label: qst201504_msg0004
rows.name:
Stop, Azami. They won't
talk even if you do that.

rows.label: qst201504_msg0005
rows.name:
Then how do you want
to make them confess?

rows.label: qst201504_msg0006
rows.name: How about we check that wooden box?

rows.label: qst201504_msg0007
rows.name:
It seems they were putting all the
herbs they gathered in there...

rows.label: qst201504_msg0009
rows.name:
So, if we examine those herbs,
we should be able to figure out
what they were planning.
